channel.title: Personal on Thoughts by Liz Carey

item.title: Reflecting on Christmas dinner
item.description: A sign of getting older is when visiting home for the holidays is more stressful than not. With every year that passes, a responsibility gets added to my plate. And with this year, both the metaphorical and literal plate as preparing Christmas dinner became one of the layered responsibilities. And like all great heroes, I didnâ€™t ask for this responsibility; it was simply bestowed upon me against my will.
